channel.title: Clark County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Clark County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End Washougal River Road at WA-14
item.description: End Washougal River Road at WA-14. Use WA-14 west for Vancouver; WA-14 east for Kennewick.

item.title: I-205 South - Exit 27
item.description: I-205 south approaching Exit 27 - WA-14/Camas/(Vancouver)City Center. WA-14 is the last exit on I-205 southbound in Washington.

item.title: I-205 South - Exit 28
item.description: I-205 South approaching Exit 28 - Mill Plain Blvd. Travel times to I-84/I-5 Junction (Downtown Portland, Oregon). On this Saturday afternoon it was 20 minutes to I-84/I-5 via I-205 and I-84; 31 minutes via WA-14 and I-5.

item.title: WA-500 East at I-205 - Vancouver
item.description: WA-500 East at I-205 in Vancouver. Use I-205 South for Salem (Oregon); I-205 North for Seattle.

item.title: WA-500 East Approaching I-205 South
item.description: WA-500 East approaching I-205 South in Vancouver. Use I-205 South for Salem (Oregon).

item.title: WA-500 East - NE Thurston Way Interchange
item.description: WA-500 East at NE Thurston Way/Vancouver Mall interchange,

item.title: WA-500 East - NE Andresen Road
item.description: WA-500 East - NE Andresen Road interchange.

item.title: WA-500 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on WA-500 East. Distance to NE Andresen Road, NE Thurston Way, and I-205.

item.title: WA-500 East - Vancouver
item.description: WA-500 East in Vancouver

item.title: WA-500 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on WA-500 east. Distance to I-205, Battle Ground, and Camas.

item.title: WA-500 East - St. Johns Blvd.
item.description: WA-500 east approaching St. Johns Blvd. exit.

item.title: I-5 North - WA-500 East Ramps
item.description: I-5 North (Exit 2) ramp to WA-500 East. Left exit for 39th St. Use right lanes for WA-500 East.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 2
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 2 - WA-500 East/39th St.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 1C and Exit 1D
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 1C - WA-501/Mill Plain Blvd. and Exit 1D - 4th Plain Blvd. I-5 continues north to Seattle.

item.description: WA-14 East at Exit 14 - WA-500 West/Union St./2nd St.

item.description: WA-14 east at Exit 10 - SE 192nd Ave.

item.description: WA-14 east at Exit 8 - SE 164th Ave.

item.title: I-205 North - Exit 27
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 27 - WA-14/Vancouver/Camas. This is the first exit in Washington along I-205.

item.title: I-205 North - Entering Washington
item.description: Entering Washington on I-205 north at the Oregon-Washington line on the Columbia River.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 21
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 21 - WA-503 East/Woodland/Cougar. Approaching Exit 22 - Dike Access Road.

item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 3 - NE Hwy. 99. The first Washington welcome sign is attached to the bottom of the overhead.

item.description: I-205 north approaching Exit 30A, WA-500/NE Gher Road/NE 112th Ave, 1 mile.

item.title: I-205 North Exit 36
item.description: I-205 north at Exit 36, NE 134th St/WSU Vancouver. I-205 joins I-5 north to Seattle shortly after this interchange.

item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 14, WA-501 West/Pioneer St/Ridgefield.

item.description: I-5 north at Exit 21, WA-503 East/Woodland/Cougar, and approaching Exit 22, Dike Access Road, 1 1/2 miles.

item.title: WA-14 East Exit 6 - I-205 Jct.
item.description: WA-14 east approaching Exit 6. Use Exit 6, I-205 south for I-84 and NE Portland.

item.description: WA-14 west approaching I-205. Use I-205 south for I-84 and NE Portland.

item.description: WA-14 west at Exit 6, I-205 north to Seattle, and south to I-84/Salem/NE Portland.

item.description: WA-14 west approaching I-205 to Seattle and Salem, 1 1/4 mile.

item.title: WA-14 West Exit 6
item.description: WA-14 west approaching Exit 6, I-205 North to Seattle, and south to I-84/Salem/NE Portland.
